footer.title: Wouessi Inc.
footer.subtitle: Turnkey growth services for real businesses.
footer.traderLine: BusinessWebHero® is a registered trader of Wouessi Inc.

hero.pill: Website first. Launch only if you approve.
hero.title: Get a bilingual, mobile-perfect website that converts.
hero.subtitle: BusinessWebHero builds a conversion-ready website fast. Then you choose: launch, improve, or walk away.
hero.boxLine1: A complete draft, ready to publish.
hero.boxLine2: You activate recurring services only if you go live.
hero.boxNote: Perfect for Canadian services and global clients.

how.subtitle: Phase 1 = Foundation. Phase 2 = Visibility & revenue.
how.s2d: You receive a working bilingual website with strong CTAs.
how.s3d: We deploy on your stack and activate growth options.
how.promiseBody: No endless delays. Clear deliverables. A website that behaves like a sales rep.

benefits.subtitle: Designed for clarity, trust, and action.
benefits.b4d: Local SEO + landing pages without rebuilding.

proof.subtitle: Swap placeholders with your real work as you close clients.
proof.t1a: Clear offer + CTAs + speed fixed our lead flow.
proof.t2a: Draft quickly, revisions simple, roadmap clear.
proof.t3a: Structure ready for SEO and campaigns.

pricing.subtitle: Simple, transparent entry — then growth.
pricing.revenueBody: Care plans, Local SEO, landing pages, reporting dashboards.

videos.subtitle: Two ready-to-film videos.
videos.placeholder: Replace posters with your recorded videos. Scripts inside the media pack.

v1.title: Video #1 — The offer
v1.desc: Risk reversal + what the client gets + CTA.

v2.title: Video #2 — Phase 1 vs Phase 2
v2.desc: Website foundation then visibility and revenue.

videos.howToReplaceBody: Upload your video, update the link (README). Posters in /public/assets.

contact.subtitle: Send your info and we respond with next steps.
contact.name: Name *
contact.privacy: Privacy: leads stored on your server (data/leads.json). SMTP optional.
contact.privacyAccept: I have read and accept the Privacy Policy and Terms (required).
contact.marketingConsent: I consent to receive marketing emails (optional).

legal.privacyIntro: We collect only the information you submit so we can respond with a proposal and deliver services.
legal.collect2: Project info (website, service interest, budget, timeline, location)
legal.collect3: Messages you submit in the form
legal.collect4: Technical logs necessary for security and troubleshooting
legal.use1: Respond to your request and send a proposal
legal.use2: Deliver the requested services and support
legal.use3: Optional: send marketing emails only if you explicitly consent
legal.storageBody: Leads are stored on your server in data/leads.json. You control retention, backups and access.
legal.rightsBody: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your data by contacting us.
legal.termsIntro: These terms govern use of this website and service delivery.
legal.scopeBody: We provide digital services such as websites, hosting, SEO and marketing as described in your proposal/contract.
legal.paymentsBody: Prices are shown in CAD or USD depending on client location. Taxes may apply. Work begins after payment confirmation.
legal.deliveryBody: Typical delivery timelines are confirmed in writing. Revisions are included as per the selected package.
legal.refundBody: Refund eligibility depends on project stage and written agreement. We aim for fair resolution.
legal.limitationBody: We are not liable for indirect damages. Total liability is limited to fees paid for the relevant service period where permitted by law.
legal.legalContact: Contact: replace with your official business email, address and phone.
legal.jurisdiction: For Canada and the US, privacy obligations (e.g., PIPEDA / applicable state laws) apply to how you handle leads.

services.title: Everything we sell (clear deliverables)
services.subtitle: Phase 1 (website) → Phase 2 (growth). Canada/US-ready.
services.payNote: Checkout uses Stripe or PayPal links you configure in .env.
services.consent: You must accept Privacy/Terms to proceed.

thankyou.subtitle: If you just paid (or are ready), submit your assets here so we can start delivery.
thankyou.next1: We verify payment and match it to your request.
thankyou.next2: We build / adjust your deliverable based on your assets.
thankyou.next3: We deliver the first draft and iterate fast.
thankyou.tipBody: If your Stripe/PayPal link did not redirect here, just open /thank-you anytime.
thankyou.formBody: Required: name, email, service purchased. Add payment reference if available.
thankyou.name: Name *
thankyou.brandPh: Colors, tone, competitors, links, content notes...
thankyou.assetsNote: You can upload logos, photos, copy docs, screenshots, brand guide PDFs.
thankyou.okBody: Your onboarding package was saved on the server.
thankyou.errBody: Could not save your onboarding package. Please try again.

cookie.text: We use essential cookies to keep the site reliable. By clicking Accept you agree to our cookie use.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: How we collect, use, store and protect your information.
privacy.collect4: Payments handled by processors; no card storage.
privacy.shareBody: No sale of data. Shared only with required processors.
privacy.securityBody: Access controls and separation by onboarding ID.

conf.title: Confidentiality Commitment
conf.intro: We treat your files and business information as confidential.
conf.scope1: Documents, designs, brand assets, access details.

seo.title: {city} website that converts
seo.subtitle: A fast, bilingual website + lead capture built to turn clicks into customers in {city}.
seo.f3: North America-ready privacy + consent + trust signals.
seo.whyBody: People in {city} judge credibility in seconds. A clean offer + proof + speed wins.
seo.risk: If we don’t improve your revenue path, you don’t stay on retainers.

partners.title: Partner with us
partners.intro: Built-in acquisition program for chambers of commerce, accounting firms, professional associations and law firms.
partners.c1Body: Offer a vetted member benefit: website foundation + optional growth retainers. Low effort, high trust.
partners.c2Body: Recommend a practical growth path after incorporation or annual review. Earn recurring commissions.
partners.c3Body: After legal setup, clients need customers. Provide a trusted path and receive partner revenue.
partners.c4Body: Niche-ready landing pages and group offers for your members (EN/FR).
partners.ctaBody: Use a unique link with ?ref=YOURCODE. Attribution is automatic and attached to onboarding.
